title.rendered: This Old House is All Cast in Eldorado Stone

content.rendered: In a feature called “All About Stone Veneer,” Eldorado Stone is prominently featured in a six-page spread in This Old House magazine! The article features Eldorado Stone’s Somerset Shadow Rock and Nantucket Stacked Stone among a beautiful colonial home, outdoor kitchen and art wall.
